query.statement:
SELECT A.WK_PER --ÀÛ¾÷ÀÚ FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1902 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON M02.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M02.POSID = Left(A.POSID, 6) AND M02.POSID_1 = A.POSID -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND M02.TEMNO2 = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF = '' -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND M02.LIFNR = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = #POSID# AND A.CHKDAT = #CHKDAT# AND A.ZZGUBUN = #ZZGUBUN#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
